cobblemon.species.sand.name: Sand
cobblemon.species.sand.desc1: Originally a piece of a block. Sand seems to have breaken free and come alive.
cobblemon.species.sand.desc2: Since sand particles are so small. It has to constantly move to stay together.
cobblemon.species.sandstone.name: Sandstone
cobblemon.species.sandstone.desc1: Sand that has finally figured itself to harden together into stone
cobblemon.species.sandstone.desc2: Since it still has muscle memory of it's past. Sandstone seems to mimic sand in it's tornado movements.
cobblemon.species.cobblestone.name: Cobblestone
cobblemon.species.cobblestone.desc1: A small piece of a cobblestone block that has come alive.
cobblemon.species.cobblestone.desc2: Since cobblestone is already broken. It struggles to hold itself in battle.
cobblemon.species.stone.name: Stone
cobblemon.species.stone.desc1: With the help of a furnace cobblestone has finally turn itself back into it's normal form
cobblemon.species.stone.desc2: Stone is much sturdier than before.
cobblemon.species.stonebricks.name: Stonebricks
cobblemon.species.log.name: Log
cobblemon.species.log.desc1: There are many different variants of Log in the world
cobblemon.species.log.desc2: Each variant seems to match the woods it's in
cobblemon.species.planks.name: Planks
cobblemon.species.planks.desc1: Only be able to be crafted. No one knows why it's still alive
cobblemon.species.planks.desc2: The variants seem to have no added affect to planks
cobblemon.species.netherrack.name: Netherrack
cobblemon.species.netherrack.desc1: Netherrack got so bored one day it decided to become alive
cobblemon.species.netherrack.desc2: What a shame that netherrack is cold
cobblemon.species.stem.name: Stem
cobblemon.species.stem.desc1: Mushroom Kingdom here we come! - Mario
